paragraph.paragraph: To save the result of evaluation of a metric over a scope:

list.item: 10_calculating_a_measure.xml Evaluate a metric over a scope.

You can enter a name in the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.xml#name name field , otherwise, the metric tool generates automatically a name for the saved measure.

Click the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.xml#add add
20_saving_a_measure.xml button. (link to buttons).

paragraph.paragraph:
The result is added to the multi column list, with a
16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_green_tick.gif 0 icon, meaning that the measure is related to the last compilation of the project.
If you are saving measures for the first time, a file will be automatically generated to store measures. It is located in the "Metrics" subfolder of current project. Otherwise, this file is updated.
A dialog reminds you of the path of the file in which measures are stored.
paragraph.note:
Note: After recompiling the project, all
16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_green_tick.gif 0 icons are changed to
16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_red_cross.gif 0 to inform that measures could have changed since project has been recompiled. You can
50_updating_recorded_measures.xml update your measures.
